text: Simon Andrews (14 August 1982 - 19 May 2014) was an English motorcycle racer. He competed in the British Superbike Championship for RAF Reserves aboard a Honda CBR1000RR. He was born in Worcester, Worcestershire. Andrews died from head injuries he got in a racing incident on 19 May 2014 in Portrush, Northern Ireland, at the age of 31 and was competing in the North West 200. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths in sport Category:Road accident deaths in the United Kingdom Category:Sportspeople from Worcestershire Category:Worcester
title: Simon Andrews (motorcycle racer)
